SEARCH
Package entity

Class BTOProject

java.lang.Object
entity.BTOProject
public class BTOProject extends Object
The BTOProject class represents a Build-To-Order housing project in the BTOMS system.

This class is central to the system and manages:

  • Project details (name, neighborhood, application period)
  • Unit inventory (different flat types and their quantities)
  • Applications for the project
  • Assigned HDB Officers
  • Project enquiries
  • Visibility and publishing settings

Projects transition through different states based on their application dates: upcoming (not yet open), active (open for applications), and closed (application period ended).

  • Constructor Details

    • BTOProject

      public BTOProject(String projectName, String neighborhood, Map<FlatType,Integer> flatUnits, LocalDate openDate, LocalDate closeDate, HDBManager manager, int maxOfficerSlots, boolean autoPublish)
      Constructs a new BTOProject with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project
      neighborhood - The neighborhood/location of the project
      flatUnits - Map of flat types to their total unit counts
      openDate - The date when applications open
      closeDate - The date when applications close
      manager - The HDB Manager responsible for this project
      maxOfficerSlots - Maximum number of officers that can be assigned
      autoPublish - Whether to automatically publish on open date

    • BTOProject

      public BTOProject(String projectName, String neighborhood, Map<FlatType,Integer> flatUnits, LocalDate openDate, LocalDate closeDate, HDBManager manager, int maxOfficerSlots)
      Constructs a new BTOProject with auto-publish disabled.

      This constructor exists for backward compatibility with existing code.

      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project
      neighborhood - The neighborhood/location of the project
      flatUnits - Map of flat types to their total unit counts
      openDate - The date when applications open
      closeDate - The date when applications close
      manager - The HDB Manager responsible for this project
      maxOfficerSlots - Maximum number of officers that can be assigned

    • addOfficer

      public boolean addOfficer(HDBOfficer officer)
      Assigns an HDB Officer to this project.

      Officers can only be added if:

      • The project has not reached its maximum officer count
      • The officer is not already assigned to this project
      Parameters:
      officer - The officer to assign
      Returns:
      true if the officer was successfully assigned, false otherwise

    • addApplication

      public void addApplication(BTOApplication application)
      Adds an application to this project.

      This also updates the remaining units count.

      Parameters:
      application - The application to add

    • removeApplication

      public boolean removeApplication(BTOApplication application)
      Removes an application from this project's application list.

      This also updates the remaining units count.

      Parameters:
      application - The application to remove
      Returns:
      true if the application was successfully removed, false otherwise

    • isApplicationPeriodOverlapping

      public boolean isApplicationPeriodOverlapping(BTOProject other)
      Determines if this project's application period overlaps with another project.

      Two projects overlap if there is any day where both are accepting applications.

      Parameters:
      other - The other project to check against
      Returns:
      true if the application periods overlap, false otherwise

    • setRemainingUnitValue

      public boolean setRemainingUnitValue(FlatType flatType, int value)
      Sets the remaining units value for a specific flat type.

      This is a helper method used by ProjectManager.

      Parameters:
      flatType - The flat type to update
      value - The new remaining units value
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise

    • setRemainingUnits

      public boolean setRemainingUnits(Map<FlatType,Integer> remainingUnits)
      Sets the remaining units for all flat types.

      This method allows for explicit control over all remaining unit values.

      Parameters:
      remainingUnits - A map containing flat types and their remaining unit counts
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise

    • updateRemainingUnits

      @Deprecated public boolean updateRemainingUnits(FlatType flatType, int booked)
      Deprecated.
      Use ProjectManager.updateRemainingUnits instead
      Updates the remaining units for a specific flat type.

      This method is deprecated. Use ProjectManager.updateRemainingUnits instead.

      Parameters:
      flatType - The flat type to update
      booked - The number of units booked
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise

    • isApplicationOpen

      public boolean isApplicationOpen()
      Checks if this project is currently open for applications.

      A project is open if the current date is between the open and close dates (inclusive).

      Returns:
      true if the project is open for applications, false otherwise

    • calculateActualRemainingUnits

      public Map<FlatType,Integer> calculateActualRemainingUnits()
      Calculates the actual remaining units for each flat type based on submitted applications.
      Returns:
      A map of flat types to their actual remaining units

    • getActualRemainingUnits

      public int getActualRemainingUnits(FlatType flatType)
      Gets the actual remaining units for a specific flat type.
      Parameters:
      flatType - The flat type to check
      Returns:
      The number of remaining units, or 0 if the flat type is not available
